trans-unit.target: 除非你操控传奇生物，否则夏尔须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·260 | The Shire | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {G}.

trans-unit.resname: LTR·260 | The Shire | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {1}{G}, {T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Create a Food token.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G}，{T}，横置一个由你操控且未横置的生物：派出一个食品衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·261 | Shire Terrace | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Shire Terrace
trans-unit.target: 夏尔梯田

trans-unit.resname: LTR·261 | Shire Terrace | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.

trans-unit.resname: LTR·261 | Shire Terrace | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}，牺牲夏尔梯田：从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·282 | Saradoc, Master of Buckland | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Saradoc, Master of Buckland
trans-unit.target: 雄鹿地统领萨拉道克

trans-unit.resname: LTR·282 | Saradoc, Master of Buckland | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME or another nontoken creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, create a 1/1 white Halfling creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当雄鹿地统领萨拉道克或另一个力量等于或小于2且非衍生物的生物在你操控下进战场时，派出一个1/1白色半身人衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·282 | Saradoc, Master of Buckland | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Tap two other untapped Halflings you control: Saradoc gets +2/+0 and gains lifelink until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 横置两个由你操控且未横置的其他半身人：直到回合结束，萨拉道克得+2/+0且获得系命异能。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·283 | Elvish Mariner | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elvish Mariner
trans-unit.target: 精灵海员

trans-unit.resname: LTR·283 | Elvish Mariner | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, scry 1.
trans-unit.target: 每当精灵海员攻击时，占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·283 | Elvish Mariner | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you scry, tap up to X target nonland permanents, where X is the number of cards looked at while scrying this way.
trans-unit.target: 每当你占卜时，横置至多X个目标非地永久物，X为以此法占卜期间所检视的牌张数量。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·284 | Ringwraiths | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ringwraiths
trans-unit.target: 戒灵

trans-unit.resname: LTR·284 | Ringwraiths | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-3 until end of turn. If that creature is legendary, its controller loses 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当戒灵进战场时，目标由对手操控的生物得-3/-3直到回合结束。若该生物是传奇，则其操控者失去3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·284 | Ringwraiths | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When the Ring tempts you, return CARDNAME from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当魔戒引诱你时，将戒灵从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·285 | Assault on Osgiliath | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Assault on Osgiliath
trans-unit.target: 突袭欧斯吉利亚斯

trans-unit.resname: LTR·285 | Assault on Osgiliath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Amass Orcs X, then Goblins and Orcs you control gain double strike and haste until end of turn. (To amass Orcs X, put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also an Orc. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Orc Army creature token first.)
trans-unit.target: 囤兵半兽人X，然后由你操控的鬼怪和半兽人获得连击与敏捷异能直到回合结束。（囤兵半兽人X的流程是，在一个由你操控的军队上放置X个+1/+1指示物。它也是半兽人。如果你未操控军队，则先派出一个0/0黑色半兽人／军队衍生生物。）

trans-unit.resname: LTR·286 | Elanor Gardner | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Elanor Gardner
trans-unit.target: 埃拉诺·加德纳

trans-unit.resname: LTR·286 | Elanor Gardner | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a Food token.
trans-unit.target: 当埃拉诺·加德纳进战场时，派出一个食品衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·286 | Elanor Gardner | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you sacrificed a Food this turn, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你本回合中牺牲过食品，则你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将该牌横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·287 | Aragorn and Arwen, Wed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Aragorn and Arwen, Wed
trans-unit.target: 新婚燕尔阿拉贡与阿尔玟

trans-unit.resname: LTR·287 | Aragorn and Arwen, Wed | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: LTR·287 | Aragorn and Arwen, Wed | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control. You gain 1 life for each other creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当新婚燕尔阿拉贡与阿尔玟进战场或攻击时，在每个由你操控的其他生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。你每操控一个其他生物，便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·288 | Sauron, the Lidless Eye | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当无睑魔眼索隆进战场时，获得目标由对手操控的生物之操控权直到回合结束。将它重置。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·288 | Sauron, the Lidless Eye | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}{R}: Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn. Each opponent loses 2 life.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}{R}：由你操控的生物得+2/+0直到回合结束。每位对手各失去2点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·289 | Frodo, Determined Hero | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Frodo, Determined Hero
trans-unit.target: 坚定英雄弗罗多

trans-unit.resname: LTR·289 | Frodo, Determined Hero | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, you may attach target Equipment you control with mana value 2 or 3 to Frodo.
trans-unit.target: 每当坚定英雄弗罗多进战场或攻击时，你可以将目标由你操控且法术力值等于2或3的武具贴附于弗罗多上。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·289 | Frodo, Determined Hero | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As long as it's your turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Frodo.
trans-unit.target: 只要是在你的回合中，便防止将对弗罗多造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·290 | Gandalf, White Rider | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gandalf, White Rider
trans-unit.target: 白骑士甘道夫

trans-unit.target: 警戒

trans-unit.resname: LTR·290 | Gandalf, White Rider | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Scry 1.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放咒语时，由你操控的生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。占卜1。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·290 | Gandalf, White Rider | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME dies, you may put it into its owner's library fifth from the top.
trans-unit.target: 当白骑士甘道夫死去时，你可以将它置于其拥有者牌库顶数来第五张的位置。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·292 | Gollum, Scheming Guide | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gollum, Scheming Guide
trans-unit.target: 密谋向导咕噜

trans-unit.resname: LTR·292 | Gollum, Scheming Guide | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, look at the top two cards of your library, put them back in any order, then choose land or nonland. An opponent guesses whether the top card of your library is the chosen kind. Reveal that card. If they guessed right, remove Gollum from combat. Otherwise, you draw a card and Gollum can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当密谋向导咕噜攻击时，检视你牌库顶的两张牌，将它们以任意顺序放回，然后选择地或非地。任一对手猜你的牌库顶牌是否为所选类别。展示该牌。若其猜对，则将咕噜移出战斗。若否，则你抓一张牌且咕噜本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·293 | Witch-king, Bringer of Ruin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Witch-king, Bringer of Ruin
trans-unit.target: 毁灭使者巫王

trans-unit.resname: LTR·293 | Witch-king, Bringer of Ruin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: LTR·293 | Witch-king, Bringer of Ruin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, defending player sacrifices a creature with the least power among creatures they control.
trans-unit.target: 每当毁灭使者巫王攻击时，防御牌手牺牲一个生物，且须是由其操控的生物中力量最小者。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·294 | Fires of Mount Doom | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 末日山烈焰

trans-unit.resname: LTR·294 | Fires of Mount Doom | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature an opponent controls. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.
trans-unit.target: 当末日山烈焰进战场时，它向目标由对手操控的生物造成2点伤害。消灭所有贴附在该生物上的武具。

trans-unit.resname: LTR·294 | Fires of Mount Doom | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{R}: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. When you play a card this way, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each player.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R}：放逐你的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用该牌。当你以此法使用牌时，末日山烈焰对每位牌手各造成2点伤害。
